column1: Madam Chartley had welcomed many types of girls to her school and was familiar with every shade of embarrassment
column2: but she had never been greeted with quite such an outburst as this. Desperate to make herself understood
column3: Mary began in the middle of her carefully planned speech and breathlessly explained backward
column4: as to why she had arrived at this inopportune time. The explanation was so characteristic of her
column6: that it revealed far more than she intended and opened a wide door into Madam's sympathies. As she stood looking down at the girl with grave kind eyes
column7: Mary suddenly became aware of a strangely comforting thing. This was not an awesome personage
column8: but a dear adorable being who could understand. The discovery made the second part of her explanation easier. She plunged into it headlong as soon as they were seated.
